English: complete change from the normal state (idiom); quite uncharacteristic

e: `如~：「`他~`平時~`口若懸河~，`能言善道~，`今日~`卻~`一反常態~，`一~`句~`話~`也~`不~`說~，`真~`令人~`百思不解~。」
d.f: `完全~`異~`於~`平時~`的~`狀況~、`態度~`等~。

English: complete change from the normal state (idiom); quite uncharacteristic
francais: totalement en dehors de la norme
